title: Add Google site verification meta tag to index.html

requirements.summary: Add Google site verification meta tag to frontend/index.html
acceptanceCriteria: The `<head>` section of `frontend/index.html` contains exactly `<meta name="google-site-verification" content="ajqPDh5gAwTpW4GTSstghaOCXr99GgBnovTx1Vckcag">`.
All existing SEO metadata tags (description, Open Graph, Twitter Card, keywords, theme-color, robots) remain intact and unmodified.
The page title and all other existing head elements are preserved.

file_operations.description: Add the Google site verification meta tag `<meta name="google-site-verification" content="ajqPDh5gAwTpW4GTSstghaOCXr99GgBnovTx1Vckcag">` inside the `<head>` section. Insert it after the existing viewport meta tag and before the Open Graph tags. Preserve all existing meta tags, title, and other head elements exactly as they are.
